metadata.description:
A seven-issue limited series.

A HEAD-ON COLLISION BETWEEN JOHN WOO AND POPE FRANCIS!

To settle an old debt of honor, a Godfather in the Mafia puts his best killer at the disposal of Vatican. This gun for hire is to work for a Cardinal, who manages a department of "secret agents" in discreet missions on the fringes of the Vatican's religious administration...
metadata.name: Spin Angels
